strIntroduction: Revel in the most beautiful city in the world as you have never seen it before, with a tour of Paris with a difference. strIntroduction: Enjoy one full day within the Versailles Palace! The Versailles castle is part of the French historical heritage. strIntroduction: Discover two popular attractions in northwest France with professional tour guides.

strIntroduction: Welcome to Palais Royal and Opera Garnier Walk.Our walk will take us to the Palais Royal, through Little Tokyo, into covered passages, and to the oldest Opera house in Paris
strTitle: Walking Guided Tour : From Palais Royal to Opera Garnier

strIntroduction: See firsthand the bustling kitchen of a famous macaron and chocolate shop in Paris. During this 1-hour behind-the-scenes tour, meet the head pastry chef and master chocolatier. Even better, taste different macarons and gourmet chocolates as you hear about the techniques that go into the world-renowned art of Parisian chocolate and macaron making.
strTitle: Gérard Mulot macaron and chocolate workshop

strIntroduction: A fun 3 hour fashion and style treat in the very heart of Paris, the world's Fashion Capital. Your friendly Parisian Fashionista guide will be your inspiration in unlocking the secrets of the Parisian sense of cool style and chic glamour.

strIntroduction: A great way to begin your visit to Paris, you’ll see Notre Dame, the Louvre, the Eiffel Tower and loads more on this small-group bike tour.

strIntroduction: Learn the art of French seduction on a 2-hour walking tour of Montmartre in Paris, the city of love and romance. You'll be introduced to the most charming secret locations where romance blossomed.
strTitle: The French art of seduction: love and romance in Montmartre

strIntroduction: Spend a delightful day exploring the towns of the French Riviera and the Provençal countryside on a private tour from Nice. Cruise down the iconic Boulevard de la Croisette and see the Film Festival Palace in Cannes, and tour a perfumery in sweet-smelling Grasse. Drive through the gorgeous Loup Gorges and take in sweeping views of the Alps and the Mediterranean from medieval Gourdon. Finally, stroll through the picturesque lanes of artsy Saint-Paul-de-Vence. Enjoy a leisurely pace and the personalized attention of your private guide.
strTitle: Countryside Private Day Trip

strIntroduction: Have a Paris city tour and discover Paris major landmarks in a small group : Notre-Dame Cathedral, Montmartre district and climb up to the 2nd floor of the Eiffel Tower.

strIntroduction: You’ll find all the charm of a typical Provencal way of life mixed with an artistic environment that is still perceivable in these cities
strTitle: The Van Gogh's tour

strIntroduction: Spend an evening at the Lido in Paris, enthralled by the Paris Merveilles show! Marvel at the precision and the energy of the dancing of the Bluebell Girls and the Lido Boys, and their stunning costumes, as you enjoy a half bottle of Champagne.

strIntroduction: Indulge yourself with an evening of sightseeing, dinner and music on the River Seine.

strIntroduction: Discover the origins of Paris on a 2-hour movie locations walk around the 2 islands at the heart of the city, and explore the city from the inside out. Learn about Notre Dame, hear about infamous gangsters, try some of the city’s best cupcakes, and more.
strTitle: Paris TV Movie Walking Tour

strIntroduction: Le Marais is a renovated old neighbourhood of Paris, right in the center, that reveals a mix of magnificient historical mansions, cutting edge fashion boutiques and lively restaurants.
strTitle: Trendy and sumptuous Marais

strIntroduction: Discover both the contemporary and the historical sides of Paris by cycling along with your professional guide
strTitle: Past and present Paris by bike

strIntroduction: Spend a half-day exploring the unforgettable attractions of Versailles, the extraordinary gardens and opulent palace that are both on UNESCO's list of World Heritage Sites.

strIntroduction: Bask in the unique allure of Saint Tropez on a small-group day trip from Nice. Gaze at luxury yachts, shop in trendy boutiques, pause for a sip in a terrace cafe and enjoy lots of fabulous people-watching.
strTitle: Saint Tropez Private Day Trip

strIntroduction: Hop over the channel and meet the neighbours with a day excursion to historic London on the Eurostar. From Paris the train glides through the world’s longest undersea tunnel, the Channel Tunnel. Taking eight years and £4.650 billion to build, the tunnel finally opened in 1994 and now transports thousands of passengers every day.
strTitle: London at your leisure from Paris

strIntroduction: This delicious tour will take you in a journey through the French culinary arts which are famous around the world.
strTitle: Paris Gourmet tour

strIntroduction: PARIS---The romance, the elegance, and the beauty Take time out to explore the paris with hop on-hop off bus tour of the city.
strTitle: Big Bus Paris Hop on - Hop off Bus Tour

strIntroduction: A suggestive and interesting tour around the must-see villages of Provence. Enjoy the history, art and nature that only this area in France
strTitle: The lavander Road : Gordes, Senaque & Sault

strIntroduction: Enjoy Paris like never before under its evening illuminations, and cruise the city streets in a vintage French convertible; a Citroen 2CV! Drive down the famous Champs Elysees and see the Eiffel Tower’s glittering lights.
strTitle: Paris by 2CV - Champs Elysees

strIntroduction: Enjoy a cruise on Seine river, and then participate in a night city tour in Paris. You can see some of the most famous sites of Paris in a brand-new way, leave the most romantic experience.

strIntroduction: Dine luxuriously aboard a glass canopy restaurant boat. Go on a cruise on the Seine River and catch the best sights of Paris at night. Enjoy a delectable three-course meal prepared only by the expert hands of a talented chef.
strTitle: Dinner Cruise with Champagne La Marina - Pickup & Drop off Hotel

strIntroduction: This privately arranged 3 hour fashion and style treat in the very heart of Paris, the world's Fashion Capital can be booked as a private and exclusive treat for you alone or with a small group of your fashion mad girlfriends or boyfriends.
strTitle: Private Personalised Fashion Shopping Trail

strIntroduction: Take a day trip to Mont Saint-Michel, a small rocky island off the coast of Normandy, and discover the beauty and charm of this unique spot at your own pace. Take in the history of this UNESCO World Heritage Site and explore its famous gothic abbey.
strTitle: Mont Saint Michel on your own

strIntroduction: Add a new element of fun to your Paris visit and head to Disneyland Paris and/or Walt Disney Studios on a 1-day ticket. Travel from the city center by RER A train, with the 40-minute journey leaving you off right in front of the amusement park.
strTitle: Train and Disneyland ticket

strIntroduction: Experience panoramic views over Nice! On the Middle Corniche, stop at Eze – a perched medieval village, with its crafts shops and breathtaking views. Take a guided tour of a perfumery, the true essence of Provence. Visit the Old Town of Monaco.

strIntroduction: Enjoy this 2-hour private guided tour of Orsay Museum with the special focus on museum s history and architecture and the 19th century art.

strTitle: Disneyland Paris: 1 Day 2 Parks with Transport

strIntroduction: Experience an unforgettable guided tour from Paris that immerses you in the history of two beautiful french castles: the Château de Vaux Le Vicomte which inspired the construction of the Palace of Versailles and the magnificent Château de Fontainebleau.
strTitle: Guided Visit of Vaux le Vicomte and Fontainebleau Châteaux

strIntroduction: Discover the wealth of natural beauty and historical significance during this visit to the Normandy Landing Beaches. This is a journey along the stunning French coastland, and into the poignant past of the region. A tour of particular significance for war veterans, their families and those interested in the period of World War II, it is also an opportunity for others to visit the Normandy region with its beautiful landscapes.
strTitle: Normandy landing beaches from Paris

strIntroduction: Savor a memorable night out in Paris with a gourmet dinner cruise along the River Seine. Float past the city’s famed monuments like the Eiffel Tower, Louvre Museum and Notre Dame Cathedral aboard a luxury Bateaux Parisiens riverboat. Soak up the magic of the City of Lights from an onboard dining room while enjoying a gourmet three-course meal. Champagne and live music completes the perfectly Parisian atmosphere!
strTitle: Dinner Cruise with Live Music - Bateaux Parisiens

strIntroduction: Steep yourself in the fabulous wine-growing region of Burgundy, with its rolling vineyards and beautiful medieval villages. You’ll learn all about the local history and viticulture traditions from your expert and personable guide and sample one of the world’s finest white wines.
strTitle: Fabulous wine-growing region of Burgundy from Paris

strIntroduction: Full day excursion from Paris to the city of Reims and its region, known all over the world for the production of Champagne.
strTitle: Guided Tour of the Reims Champagne Region from Paris

strIntroduction: Head south of Paris for an exceptional evening at Vaux-le-Vicomte ! An exceptional evening awaits you in this 17th century masterpiece which inspired Louis XIV to create Versailles.
strTitle: Dinner & Candlelight Visit of Vaux le Vicomte

strIntroduction: Walk into gourmet Paris during this 2 hours and a half tour in Les Halles-Montorgueil area "The Belly of Paris".
strTitle: Gourmet food tour in Central Paris - Les Halles/Montorgueil quarter

strIntroduction: Head off to discover the secrets of lavender in Provence! Admire the landscapes rich in colours and perfumes, full of history and traditions, which inspired many painters.
strTitle: Guided Daytrip in Provence: Villages in Lubéron and Lavender's Discovery - by TGV from Paris

strIntroduction: Visit Paris by night in a double-decker bus. Discover the main monuments of Paris and the quarters, the bridges over the illuminated Seine river, the magic "City of Lights".
strTitle: Paris by Night: City Tour by Open Top bus
